original_text: and the men of Ai killed about thirty-six of their men and chased them before the gate as far as Shebarim and struck them at the descent. And the hearts of the people melted and became as water.
korean_text: 아이 사람이 그들을 삼십육 명쯤 쳐죽이고 성문 앞에서부터 스바림까지 쫓아가 내려가는 비탈에서 쳤으므로 백성의 마음이 녹아 물 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: and the men of Ai killed about thirty-six of their men
sentences.korean_translation: 아이 사람들이 그들 중 삼십육 명 가량을 죽이고

sentences.original_text: and chased them from the gate as far as Shebarim
and struck them at the descent
And the hearts of the people melted
